input: question: Who was the widow affected by the Same-sex marriage decision ruled on by the Sixth Circuit from Ohio? context: Same-sex marriage in Ohio is legal under the U.S. Supreme Court ruling in "Obergefell v. The case was named after plaintiff Jim Obergefell, who sued the state of Ohio after officials refused to recognize his marriage on the death certificate of his husband.
